executable.title: BRAINSCut (BRAINS)
executable.contributor: Vince Magnotta, Hans Johnson, Greg Harris, Kent Williams, Eunyoung Regina Kim

file.name: netConfiguration
file.label: Neural Net Configuration File
file.description: XML File defining BRAINSCut parameters. OLD NAME. PLEASE USE modelConfigurationFilename instead.

boolean.name: multiStructureThreshold
boolean.label: multiStructureThreshold
boolean.description: multiStructureThreshold module to deal with overlaping area

boolean.name: histogramEqualization
boolean.label: histogram Equalziation Process
boolean.description: A Histogram Equalization process could be added to the creating/applying process from Subject To Atlas. Default is false, which genreate input vectors without Histogram Equalization.

boolean.name: computeSSEOn
boolean.label: Testing with testing vector input
boolean.description: compute Sum of Square Error (SSE) along the trained model until the number of iteration given in the modelConfigurationFilename file

boolean.name: createVectors
boolean.label: Create Vectors
boolean.description: create vectors for training neural net

boolean.name: NoTrainingVectorShuffling
boolean.label: NoTrainingVectorShuffling
boolean.description: If this flag is on, there will be no shuffling.

boolean.name: validate
boolean.label: Validate
boolean.description: validate data set.Just need for the first time run ( This is for validation of xml file and not working yet )

integer.name: numberOfTrees
integer.label: number of trees for random tree
integer.description: Random tree: number of trees. This is to be used when only one model with specified depth wish to be created.

integer.name: randomTreeDepth
integer.label: depth for random tree
integer.description: Random tree depth. This is to be used when only one model with specified depth wish to be created.

string.name: modelFilename
string.label: modelFilename
string.description: model file name given from user (not by xml configuration file)
